name: Boarding School Mysteries
description:
Bording School Mysteries is a little atmosphere game developed in blueprint on UnrealEngine 4, this is my 3rd project that I publish on this engine.

Particular point:
This is the first game in which I starting in a blank project no template proposed by unreal was used ...

Assets used:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/forgotten-hotel
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/realistic-trees

The rest are free assets taken from:

https://free3d.com/
gold
https://www.turbosquid.com/

Music:

The different music and sounds were found on the internet and its all free of rights
Only the voice is made via a TextToSpeech

Boarding School Mysteries uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere "

"Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 - 2017, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved."
